snippet: In the widening world of classes taught online, new technologies are helping to ensure that students on distant laptops are doing their own work.
abstract: Anne Eisenberg Novelties column observes that in widening world of online classes, new technologies are helping to ensure that students are doing their own work.
lead_paragraph: In the widening world of classes taught online, new technologies are helping to ensure that students on distant laptops are doing their own work.

headline.seo: New Technologies Aim to Foil Online Course Cheating
headline.main: Keeping an Eye on Online Test-Takers
headline.print_headline: Keeping an Eye On Online Test-Takers
